name: Eye of Luden
tooltip:
Eye of Luden

Cost: 3400
+15 Ability Haste
+100 Ability Power
+800 Mana
+15 Magic Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Echo: Damaging an enemy with an ability deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds (10 second cooldown).

UNIQUE Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
